Very easy to use

item.title: My Furry Protogen 2 üêæ
item.description:
About This Game



My Furry Protogen 2 continues the story of a protogen scientist named Juno and her love - our main hero. After two years of training, preparation and research, they have finally found some clues that could help them find their enemy. With some outside help, new equipment and a new armor for Juno, they are now more than ready to continue their mission!

The relationship between our heroes has also gotten stronger - they love each other more than anything and spend all their time together, but even their relationship has some minor problems. Although they solve them easily, things are starting to heat up for both of them, as it seems that their interests and hobbies are a bit different. Will they be able to overcome this stage of their relationship or will it get even worse?

Continue the story of Juno and our hero, discover new planets and face new dangers in My Furry Protogen 2!

Features:

‚Ä¢ Cute female protogen!
‚Ä¢ HD fully original artworks.
‚Ä¢ Relaxing atmosphere.
‚Ä¢ Some personal drama, as usual.

item.title: Alchemist Quest
item.description:
About This Game




Alice is a promising young alchemist in the Alchemists' Fellowship, and she has it all. She has a prestigious job, she just got her own house, and the fellowship pays her a monthly stipend... Or it did, before it kicked her out for failing her annual review. Alice's only means of getting reinstated is to complete one of the quests she's been given.

With multiple main quests to choose from, it's up to you how Alice goes about getting her job back!


Each of the main quests issued by the Alchemists' Fellowship involves different methods of playing the game. Will you brave the dungeon area and all of its turn-based RPG action to bring the fellowship proof of your prowess? Will you elect to go the farming route and grow mythical crops in your garden? Will you gather the resources you need to expand your home beyond what contemporary craftsmanship allows? Or will you spend your time fishing for a legendary lunker?

No two routes play exactly the same, and you can take on whichever you want‚Äîor even all of them at once‚Äîwhile also completing optional quests for a variety of townsfolk.






Multiple Ways to Play
No two main quests play the same. You can enjoy a traditional turn-based RPG or complete quests that involve no combat at all.

Mercenaries for Hire
If you choose to challenge the game's dungeons, you can hire your choice of four mercenaries to go along with you. Each one has her own unique talents, so you can enjoy building a party of two that suits your combat style!

Pacifist Routes
Several of the game's main quests focus on different kinds of gathering, and thus can be completed without ever seeing a battle screen. If you like to relax with a fishing rod or a pickaxe in hand, Alchemist Quest has you covered!

The Tower of Ordeals
For those who love a challenge, there's a gauntlet of brutal post-game battles waiting to test your mettle after the credits roll!

item.title: Night Raider
item.description:
About This Game

‚ñ≤ Combat!
Removing zombies one by one with silenced firearms and close-in weapons will allow you to explore safely most of the time, but you will still inevitably encounter a wave of zombies roaming the streets, so don't let your guard down. If you have enough ammunition, try to use a heavy gun to clean up the enemy!
Don't trust any survivors like you who came from other survivor camps to loot the city. They're more interested in ripping supplies off your hands than they are in a time-consuming search of the city, and humans are much scarier than zombies.
‚ñ≤ Death!
Once your character dies, you lose all the equipment and supplies you carry, so survival is the key to this game. When your character is killed, you might want to try your luck with scavengers team, who are experts in salvaging lost objects.
‚ñ≤ Dark!
Face the endless night of the zombie crisis, then feel your way through the darkness. But in the face of other survivors, night may be your weapon.
‚ñ≤ Refit!
With more than 60 weapons and nearly 200 modified accessories, modify the strongest and most reliable weapons you like to shoot zombies!
‚ñ≤ Manage!
Irregular item size backpack system. There's always a lot of trash to pick up, so manage your backpack, ditch the worthless goods, and leave with what's really useful.
‚ñ≤ Explore!
Go to different city scenes and explore different buildings. Be careful with your ammo and supplies, and plan your escape time, once your ammo runs out you will not be able to leave the city alive.
‚ñ≤ Camp!
While in camp, you'll be safe, interacting with different NPCS, managing warehouses, selling or buying supplies and equipment, or trading treasured supplies for rare items, and of course, you'll be able to talk to an instructor about training programs to improve yourself.

„Äê Update Plan „Äë
Task system
Pet system
Role DIY system
Total difficulty selection system „Äê Completed ‚àö„Äë
New talent stat system
New more accurate minimap feature
Game handbook system
Cooking system
Map special TAG
Backpack independent window
More buildings
More guns
More gun accessories
More props
More zombie types
Camp Arms wall feature, can display the player's own collection of weapons
And some other small features (one-click organizing, splitting items, etc.)

item.title: Kurone's Feelings ~Apprentice Witch of Starfall Village~
item.description:
About This Game

Kurone's Feelings is an adv game developed by Bielograf, and published by OTAKU Plan



Kurone's Feelings ÔΩûApprentice Witch of Starfall VillageÔΩû
follows a girl who has lost her memories as she gradually develops
human "feelings" and stumbles through various mishaps while doing her best
to assist the witch of a small village in helping the locals.




-Cuteness prevails!
Kurone's various misadventures will never ruin her cheer.

-Lots of costumes!
Some requests will have Kurone change her outfit,
and the nice Kurone will never refuse a person in need.

-Go out and explore!
Explore the village and search for people in need.
As you help them, Kurone's fame will grow, earning her even more requests.

-Stats and feedback!
Kurone's progress is recorded in detail, and while she's sleeping,
you can take a peek into the villagers' thoughts about her.

item.title: The Return of the King
item.description:
About This Game

This game tests hands-on ability and brain thinking.
It is an elegant and civilized sport that combines entertainment and competitiveness, mental activity and physical exercise, requiring skills, strategies, and a little luck.
You must use a limited number of balls stably and accurately to throw all the sticks down, otherwise you will fail. The game has a very refreshing and healing art style, full of physical elements, and its built-in background music is very pleasant, allowing players to experience high-quality music while experiencing the game. The difficulty of operation is very simple and easy to get started.
Players only need to click and press the mouse to determine the throwing direction, and continuously analyze the location of the field during the competition to determine your strategy. You can fully experience the excitement brought by the ball throwing game.

item.title: OCTAMETA
item.description:
About This Game

Brief

Octameta is a distinctive 3D puzzle game that immerses players in an enduring exploration of the enigmas of human science.

Story

In a world where human civilization has collapsed, you will take on the role of an intelligent being, reconstructing and comprehending the evolution of human technology by solving a symbolic two-layered Rubik's Cube composed of technological fragments. The main focus of the gameplay lies in deciphering the Rubik's Cube, while the secondary aspect involves solving puzzles in small-scale scenarios.

Levels

We have four civilization fragments to restore. Restoring the Rubik's Cube at each stage involves an in-depth exploration of scientific principles, such as polar coordinates (representing reproduction), Newtonian gravity (representing money), circuit theory (representing religion), and Fourier transform (representing power). Those principles not only embody the scientific progress of human history, but also reflect fundamental issues of human society.

Epilogue

Every significant advancement in the field of natural science made by humanity serves as a means of reinforcing the social structure. Despite originating from pure curiosity, it invariably veers off course due to the powerful inertia of the social system.
This phenomenon recurs at every stage of human social evolution: from slavery to feudalism, and from feudalism to capitalist private ownership. Mathematics is utilized for taxation, while the information exchange facilitated by the internet progressively erects firewalls and censorship. Those all results into class solidification.

Even if humanity ultimately transitions to extinction, the exploitation of the scientific impartial stance by a select few powerful individuals will turn everything established by science into a double-edged sword poised over all of humanity.

item.title: Lagoon Lounge 2 : The Secret Roommate
item.description:
About This Game

Story

The protagonist is a beastman who collapsed from overwork and quit his job. He is currently staying at a friend's house in the lakeside village of Shunzhou.



One day, the protagonist discovers a lion beastman hiding in the shade, urinating. Upon closer inspection, it seems he was camping out. Feeling sorry for him, thinking he couldn't afford to stay at an inn due to lack of money, the protagonist takes it upon himself to let him stay at his friend's house.

While the lion beastman sleeps in exhaustion, the protagonist, curious about the contents of his carry-on case, discovers an unprecedented amount of banknotes.



"‚Ä¶What should I do...?"

At that moment, the protagonist realizes that he has picked up an extraordinary individual.

Gameplay

A visual novel featuring beastmen. It is a sequel to the previous work, "Lagoon Lounge: The Poisonous Fountain."

The system focuses on simplicity and replayability, allowing you to revisit any episode from the episode list and easily make different choices.

Languages

As of January 2024, it supports Japanese, English, Traditional Chinese, Korean, Thai, Spanish-Spanish, and Latin-Spanish.

item.title: Wall Ball
item.description:
About This Game

WallBall is a Single Player and Multiplayer Game Where Timing is Everything.

Hit the ball just right and score big points quickly.
Hit the ball too early or late and suffer a painful wait as you see your opponent score points.
*Arcade styled game plays as fast or as slow as you play.
**Start in the Moon Arena and collect wins to earn different interstellar arena locations.

The Rhythm:

When you hit the ball just right a rhythm begins to develop, much like a boxer with a speed bag, timing is everything.
This natural rhythm starts to speed the ball up, the question is, can you keep up and put big points on the leaderboard?

Single Player:

Score as many points as possible before a third out and make it to the top of the leaderboard!

Multiplayer:

Score 21 points before your opponent to win the game!
*Win 3 out of 5 games to take the match.
**Win 3 games in a row and put a Domination Match on the leaderboard.
***Average multiplayer game is ~45 seconds, fastest game on record is 11 seconds!
****Auto-Rematch is engaged until best of 5 is reached unless a player quits.
*****Quitting mid-game is impossible. Quitting is only possible after game... quitter.

Scoring:

Hit the front wall = 1 point
Hit the roof = 2 points
Hit the backstop = 3 points
Hit the back wall = 7 points (WALL BALL)
Hit the floor before front wall = Out (single player only)
*all combinations possible
**Hit 3 WallBalls in a row and put an Impossible Shot on the leaderboard.

Fun, fast, intensely-competitive when you want, chill when you don't.

Welcome to the Future, Welcome to WallBall.

item.title: Lorhaven: Cursed War
item.description:
About This Game

Embark on a journey through the haunted provinces of Lorhaven, where the long-gone undead have risen, threatening to plunge the realm into eternal darkness. As the commander of your castle, every decision you make will shape the outcome of this harrowing conflict.



Key Features:

1. Recruit and Counter:
Assemble your army wisely; each unit plays a vital role in countering the undead menace. Strategic decisions on the battlefield are the key to survival.

2. Unearth Legendary Heroes:
Discover legendary heroes, and ancient warriors with unique abilities that can turn the tide of battle. With limited recruitment opportunities, choose heroes wisely to become the beacon of hope in the darkness.

3. A Tale of Desperation and Hope:
Immerse yourself in a story-driven campaign that unfolds the mysteries behind the Cursed War. Navigate through provinces filled with desperation, hope, and the echoes of a past long buried.

4. Dynamic Maps and Map Editor:
Explore crafted maps designed to challenge your tactical prowess. Want more? Dive into the map editor and create your battlegrounds, for endless strategic possibilities.

5. Living Lore:
The provinces of Lorhaven are steeped in history and lore. Uncover the secrets of the undead's return as you progress through the campaign, adding layers of depth to the immersive world.

6. Strategic Depth Beyond the Battlefield:
Beyond unit recruitment and battles, capture towns, lumber mills, and mines to gain resources. Fortify walls for defense, or strategically place units on towers for enhanced sight. Every decision on the map shapes the fate of Lorhaven.

Are you prepared to lead Lorhaven through the shadows? The undead have returned, and only your tactical brilliance can stem the tide of The Undying War. Will you be the savior Lorhaven desperately needs?

item.title: Scrap and Battery
item.description:
About This Game



Scrap and Battery stars a little robot working in a factory since the day he was made. Tired of working, he decides to take matters into his own hands and attempts to escape! Help him navigate through the large facility and reach the bottom of the facility. Utilize various abilities to build your playstyle and bring havoc to the facility! However, your limited battery is your enemy. Will you make it to the end? Or become scraps while trying?



  • Express how you want to play by building your load out of your abilities!
  • Upgrade and improve your abilities with scraps picked up through levels!
  • Navigate through 7 levels and confront various types of enemies within. Absorb their energy by defeating them.
  • Hold onto your battery to stay powered! Enemies will try to knock it off by any means necessary!
  • Attempt multiple runs to test your best builds and break your records!



This game was developed as a student project at DigiPen Institute of Technology and was created for educational purposes only. Please check out our publisher page for more information.

item.title: The Tour
item.description:
About This Game

The groundbreaking concert tour across the solar system is nearly here, and Jon knows that he and his band are going to need to be at the top of their game before they can rock out with other spacefarers.

That's where our story starts today.

The Cosmic Mechanix are back together, and put together a tour of America to get back in sync and learn some new tunes.

Help them get back into the groove, learn and perfect new songs and perform those songs at major venues in this Rhythm Band-Management game.

Gameplay:
  • Learn and perfect new songs
  • Perform pop-up concerts to help build the bands funding and popularity
  • Work to achieve 3 star ratings on concerts.

item.title: Okashi Towers
item.description:
About This Game



Okashi Towers is a Real Time Strategy game with Tower Defense elements. Gather candy resources to build defensive tower units or go on the offensive and summon creatures to attack other player bases.





A mixture of tower defense and RTS. Control a base and spend candy resources to summon upgradable tower units to build defenses and increase the amount of candy resources received over time. Spend resources to summon offensive units that can be controlled individually in an RTS style to find and destroy enemy units and their base through fog of war.





  • Solo Story Mode Campaign
  • Online Multiplayer Up to 8 Players
  • Play with any combination of up to 8 Teams and 8 Players (or NPCs)
  • Create custom designed maps in the Map Builder
  • 4 Factions to choose from, each with a different play style
  • Multi-language Support

item.title: A Night at the Watermill
item.description:
About This Game



It was raining und thunderstorming.
In the middle of the night.
And there happened something ...
... something terrible.

At the old abandoned ... WATERMILL.




  • Point and click adventure
  • Simple and clean interface
  • Vast narrative - Experience the story parts by exploring
  • Handdrawn comic-art
  • Thrilling ambience sound and suspenseful soundtrack
  • Short playtime (~45min-1 hour)
  • 3 different game endings




You wake up with no memory.
In the middle of the night.
You are locked up.
You are alone ... or are you not?

Find out what happened and escape from the old watermill!
And maybe ... not everything is as it seems ...

item.title: Tails of War
item.description:
About This Game

Command an army to face off against your feline foes in a game of strategy, wits, and whiskers.

Champions

Vibrant cast of 6 unique champions - Pick from six unique champions from the desert, grassland, and tundra kingdom. Discover their unique personalities through their voice acting.
Use Your Specials to Turn the Tide of Battle - Each faction gives their champion a unique special ability. Spawn an ally from thin air to defend yourself as a tundra champion. Move an extra turn to get a kill on a faraway enemy as a grass champion. Teleport yourself out of harms way as a desert champion.

Units

Wide Array of 8 Different Units - Spawn from a selection of 8 different units on the ground and in the air! Utilize their strengths and weaknesses to gain an edge in combat.

Strategy

Position Your Units on Advantageous Terrains - Head into the mountains to escape an assassin. Use the cover of the forests to defend yourself from attacks.
Give your units a boost - Capture Artifacts of Power and Key Locations to give yourself and your units a strategic edge. Artifacts of Power give buffs to the unit that captures it for as long as they live. Key Locations give entire team-wide buffs to whichever team holds the location.

Multiplayer

Play against a computer controlled opponent - or play against a friend in our online multiplayer mode! Customize the match's rules to your liking!

About

Tails of War was created by a 45 person multidisciplinary team over two semesters at the University of Michigan's WolverineSoft Studio, a student games studio undertaking semester-long projects. It is an educational case study of Wargroove, and takes inspiration from its game mechanics as well as other games in the genre. Work on this project took place between May 2023 to January 2024.

item.title: I'm counting to 6...
item.description:
About This Game

"Play with me!"


"I'm counting to 6..." is a psychological thriller from the first person.

Average time to complete the game: 60 minutes



It was a small, unremarkable village where people could live a carefree life. They did their jobs, raised their children. But one day completely destroyed the hope for a good future‚Ä¶ A child disappeared and after a while the case was repeated. The residents united and were one step away to find out the shocking truth, but everything did not go as planned.

The main character, Grisha, is heading to the city to visit his grandfather. Driving through thick fog, the main character's car gets into an accident. And now he has to walk further to find at least someone who could tell him the way. So he finds himself in an abandoned village. Grisha does not yet know what secrets this place holds, but he will be forced to figure everything out when he gets to the damn old house.



Game Features:
- The game is made on Unreal Engine 5;
- The genre of "Walking Simulator";
- The gameplay is close to realism;
- As the game progresses, the way the main character sees the environment changes to the view through the camera;
- Explore an abandoned village;
- Find out what happened to its inhabitants;
- Solve the mystery of the cursed house;
- The soundtrack will immerse you in the world of "I'm counting to 6", conveying the madness.

item.title: The Mine
item.description:
About This Game

Step into the world of "The Mine," a captivating 3D point-and-click adventure set in the copper mines of 17th-century Sweden. Created by Nordic Legacy Studios, this game combines humor and fun, yet challenging puzzles to transport you to a unique historical setting.




Explore the town of Elsborg, from the mine's surface to its deep underground passages, along with the local pub, where comfort and diversion await. Engage with fully voiced characters, each hiding their own secrets. Your choices dictate your route, as mysterious dreams and puzzling clues thicken the plot.



Experience enjoyable puzzles with multiple solutions, ranging from accessible to challenging, set against immersive environments that take you back in time. The original soundtrack by Fredrik Eklind perfectly complements the atmosphere, ensuring you are fully immersed in the world of "The Mine".



‚óè Authentic and immersive historical setting of 17th-century Swedish mining
‚óè Memorable characters with unique personalities and fully voiced dialogues
‚óè Fun and challenging puzzles with multiple solutions for a dynamic experience
‚óè Engaging environments that transport you back in time
‚óè Original soundtrack by Fredrik Eklind that sets the mood perfectly




Journey back in time to 17th century Sweden and uncover the secrets buried deep within the dark tunnels of "The Mine."

item.title: Ultimate Ragdoll Game
item.description:
About This Game

ABOUT

Ultimate Ragdoll Game is a sandbox game without any limitations. The game has no specific way to play or end, your goal is to have a good time!

GAMEPLAY

The game is divided into several modes that allow you to build your dream sandbox. Build with the blocks available in the game, freely change their properties, and have fun with ragdolls.

STEAM WORKSHOP

The game has full Steam Workshop support. Download various ragdolls, blocks, weapons, maps, and much more! You can also create your own content using the included SDK and simple step-by-step instructions.

FREE DLCs

The game comes with 2 free expansions: Goofy Ahh Sounds and Blood and Gore, which significantly enhance the gaming experience (actually, just fart sounds and a bit of blood, but in my opinion, it's still a cool feature).

JOE BIDEN

Despite Joe Biden appearing on every third screenshot, this is NOT a game about Joe Biden... BUT (!) you can download his model from the Steam Workshop, and THEN it CAN be a game about Joe Biden... or someone else... do whatever you want, after all, that's what this game is all about.

item.title: Detective Kiwi
item.description:
About This Game

ABOUT
"Detective Kiwi" is a free to play multiplayer puzzle game that designed up to 6 players, featuring a simple rule: There will be 4 images every round. You need to find them as fast as you can.

PURPOSE
Simple and entertaining gameplay allows you to improve your finding skills and memory. Every round, you need to find 4 images in a bunch of others and press ring button as fast as you can. The player who find more images fastly, will get more score.

CUSTOMIZABLES
You can customize your avatar, avatar frames, emotes and icons.

item.title: Furniture : Build & Repair
item.description:
About This Game

Build, repair, and clean numerous pieces of furniture at your own pace in Furniture, a relaxation game where cleaning and construction come together to provide a serene experience during your leisure time.



  • Unbox the furniture to reveal its pieces, and maybe even a few surprises...
  • Rearrange them to your liking for a clearer view.
  • Clean, repair, or repaint different parts if necessary.
  • Assemble the furniture step by step until its complete construction.
  • Move on to the next piece and discover what it holds for you.

Fix a granny's carousel, clean the neighbor's cat tree, or build a child's cardboard castle. Take your time to build each piece of furniture while enjoying a cozy atmosphere.



(You might even find a few surprises in the boxes‚Äîhave fun playing!)

item.title: Ancient Warfare 3
item.description:
About This Game

Dive into a sandbox full of action and customization! Choose from different game modes like deathmatch, conquest, king of the hill, zombie survival and many more. Create your own scenarios in the custom battle editor. Choose your rules, change the environment, place units, objects or traps, choose your equipment and fight or just relax and spectate a battle.

Content

Explore content from different eras starting in the stone age, medieval ages, WWI, WWII and the modern era up to futuristic sci-fi content. 3400+ units, 1100+ objects and 580+ equipment items await you.
In addition, the Steam Workshop integration allows you to share your creations and choose from 23000+ battles, 5900+ prefabs, 25000+ units, 2200+ campaigns and various equipment items and objects to use them in your own creations!

In-game editors

The central idea behind the game is to let players customize everything and create their own content!
In the custom battle editor you can place units, objects and other items to create your own scenarios with various game modes and settings for each object and unit to adjust their behavior.

Custom units

The custom unit editor allows you to create detailed and complex units with various equipment slots and settings like color adjustments for armor and clothing items.

Custom items

The custom equipment and object editors allow you to import your own models into an easy to use in-game editor to create custom melee and ranged weapons, grenades, shields, armor, clothing and environment, consumables and various other functional objects to use them in the battle editor or to create more unique looking custom units.

Scripting Engine

To give players even more control, there is an event based visual scripting engine which can be used to create custom behavior and rules for battles, units, objects and the player.

item.title: FREAKHUNTER
item.description:
About This Game

WITH EACH PASSING MOMENT, THEIR DIMENSION GROWS...

FREAKHUNTER is a dungeon-crawler-rail-shooter-action-hybrid for sickos, developed on vibes, and created as an exercise in actually finishing a video game. It's inspired by early FPS games like SILENT DEBUGGERS on PC-Engine and Shadow Over Innsmouth on Virtual Boy.

It'll probably take a little under two hours to reach the end.

True HUNTERS wield a controller - although mouse and keyboard are supported!

FEATURES!

  • Navigate 24 grid-based levels with smooth, slick movement!
  • Obliterate nasty FREAKS with 4 different juicy weapons!
  • Find special items to outsmart the FREAKS and shake up encounters!
  • Travel across 4 distinct worlds!
  • Experience a slightly blurry upscale of a 640x480 image with unfiltered textures!

WHAT PEOPLE ARE SAYING:

  • "intimidating"
  • "i've straight up never been motion sick from anything before"
  • "its' REALY COOL,"
  • "actually it's cubivore kileak: the blood"
  • "confusing"
  • "why does this feel like you put a voodoo card into a pc98"
  • "really devious"
  • "doesn't even let you get gay married 0/10"

item.title: BioGun: Clinical Trial
item.description:
About This Game



Transfer your progress from this prologue to the main game

Join Bek on his journey to save the entire canine species from an extinction caused by the sinister Dooper Virus. Inject yourself into a zany hand-drawn world of germs, cells, and winding passages full of vibrant characters and ferocious bosses with a story that takes place inside our beloved pets.

Give your dog a fighting chance by aiding its immune system to fight off the Dooper Virus. Befriend cells on your journey, absorb new powers from vanquished foes and explore vital organs to prevent them from failing! Will you be the vaccine to save dog-kind from extinction or will DocX have to return to the drawing board?


Game Features

Prologue version of the game BioGun. The story begins with clinical trial.

Fast paced side-scrolling 360 shooter action with all the modern gameplay mechanics you‚Äôve come to expect and more.

Blast your enemies with an impressive array of weapons. Augment your DNA and modify your playstyle using Nano-Chips.

Take on bosses inspired by real diseases in uniquely designed encounters.

Complete side missions to aid Cells in need. Explore each organ to earn rewards and learn about the life forms that live there.


Traverse a hand-drawn microscopic world full of traditionally animated cells, germs, viruses and bacteria. Meet the wondrous creatures, both friendly and hostile, that inhabit it. Discover the many secrets cleverly hidden in your dog's body.

You will be accompanied on your mission by a blood-pumping score by Juhani Junkala

Save humanity's best friend. Prove that you‚Äôre the vaccine that can put an end to the pet-demic. What are you waiting for? Put on your hazard suit and blast some viral scum! The fate of dog-kind is in your hands!

item.title: Supermarket Simulator: Prologue
item.description:
About This Game

This Prologue is a limited version of the full game to stop waiting and jump into running your supermarket already. Don't forget to wishlist the full game to continue your most fun supermarket experience.

Design your store, optimizing for efficiency and aesthetics. Determine where products are displayed, manage your aisles, and ensure a smooth shopping experience for your customers.



Order stock using an in-game computer and anticipate the arrival of your next delivery. Unpack goods, organize them in your storage room and display them on shelves, fridges, and freezers.



Read product barcodes, handle cash and credit card transactions, and ensure customers leave satisfied with their shopping and checkout experience.



Navigate the complexities of a real-time market. Buy products when prices dip and determine the best-selling prices to balance customer satisfaction with profit margins.



Wishlist the full game "Supermarket Simulator" where every decision matters. Will you rise to the occasion, transforming a modest establishment into a retail powerhouse, all while balancing customer satisfaction, finances, and mafia expectations?

item.title: Paper Lily - Chapter 1
item.description:
About This Game

Something terrible has happened. You can‚Äôt bear to think about it - but you can‚Äôt live like this anymore. You stopped attending school, you haven‚Äôt left your house in months, you have no reason to get out of bed anymore. There are no choices left.

No choice except... that strange golden letter.

It‚Äôs time to get your life back together.

One last try.



Paper Lily is a story-driven, psychological horror RPG where each puzzle has multiple solutions and outcomes. There is always another way.
Follow Lacie's story as you explore a dangerous hidden world, solve puzzles in multiple different ways, and face strange enemies. The game is playable in about 4 hours and contains multiple endings depending on your actions.

Paper Lily - Chapter 1 is the continuation to the prologue, Project Kat, but it can also be enjoyed without having played it.

Out of Context Features



  • Multiple ways of solving puzzles!
  • Touch grass, and trees
  • Minigames where you press buttons and push boxes around
  • Call your mother
  • Harmless Snack‚Ñ¢
  • Various things made of paper
  • Bunnies (or whatever those things are)
  • Demons
  • Fast demons
  • Social anxiety simulation
  • Table salt
  • ...Is that Kat? Nah, probably not
  • Bathroom etiquette
  • Death

item.title: Chains of Acquisition
item.description:
About This Game

Real-World Economics

Chains of Acquisition is a multiplayer turn-based economy simulator where you strategically manage your corporate empire, grounded in real-world economic principles. Delve into a detailed simulation that challenges you to outmaneuver your competitors and dominate prospective markets.

Fractional Ownership

Buy and sell shares of your friend‚Äôs and foe‚Äôs supply chains alike, turning their success into your advantage. Ownership of assets is fluid and manipulating shares will be the key to security, the market can be slowed but never stopped.

Expansive Industries

Set in an alternate timeline beginning in the 1700s, take charge of your company as you progress through the ages. Stay ahead of the competition by researching new technologies to maintain your edge across constantly advancing industries.

Invent New Products

Master extensive supply chain recipes spanning multiple major sectors of industry. Innovate and gain a competitive edge by creating patents and developing unique custom resources that set your corporation apart.

Detailed Supply Chains

Find and create ever more complex links in your corporate empire as you profit through clever business practices. Strategically build expansive supply networks, from sourcing raw materials to dominating retail markets.

Full Workshop Support

Featuring full Steam Workshop support, add new maps, resources, and nodes, or overhaul the entire base game. Make it yours.

item.title: Tour Manager: Secret Stories
item.description:
About This Game


Tour Manager offers you the role of a director of a travel agency, who has to create a successful business from scratch. You have to hire guides, buy buses, open attractions so that customers are satisfied with the services of your company. Run advertising to attract new customers. Manage the company's finances. This city needs a good travel agency!

Manage your agency's finances

Clients contact your agency to get to know the city better. And after the trip they evaluate the agency. The assessment is influenced by the cost of the trip, the quality of the bus, the skill of the guide, whether the client‚Äôs interests are taken into account, and the design of the agency‚Äôs office. Therefore, it is necessary to select the price of the tour so that there is money for development, but also not to upset clients. If suddenly there is a miscalculation with financial planning, then the bank will come to the rescue.

Buy new buses

You can add several bus models to the agency's fleet. From low-capacity, slow ones with hard seats, to luxurious high-speed buses.

Plan optimal routes

Attractions in the game are divided into 6 categories. Tourists who contact your agency also have their own interests. Some are interested in historical places, some in natural beauty, others are looking for spiritual inspiration. Therefore, it is advisable to plan the bus route so that all passengers find it interesting.

Develop your team

Guides are an important part of the travel agency team. Green novices come to work for your agency, but over time they will become cool professionals. During excursions, guides gain experience and grow in level. When you level up, you can choose a guide perk.
